name: Cruise Ship Target Practice
desc: When the Railboat Cruise Ship is moving, "Villainous Targets" will spring up not far from the tracks. Shoot the targets as soon as they appear and watch out for incoming attacks — don't let those thrice-darned villains damage your railboat!

imgDesc.text: When the Railboat Cruise Ship is moving, "Villainous Targets" will spring up not far from the tracks. Shoot the targets as soon as they appear and watch out for incoming attacks — don't let those thrice-darned villains damage your railboat!
You can reload by pressing the reload button, but if you forget, don't sweat it, the cannon reloads automatically when empty...
